title: Mayantha says no to joining govt.
body_lines: Referring to reports that he is to join the government, Samagi Jana Balawegaya ( SJB) MP Mayantha Dissanayake said he will not join the government.
He told a press conference earlier that he had received an invitation to join the government. "I am prepared to serve the nation if I get an opportunity," he had said.(YP)
